entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 12:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 70 early in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
